duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diversified clerical functions in Registration/Information, Appointments, Patient Care modules and other areas such as Cashiering and Medical Records.
Maintain the security and confidentiality of patient information at all times.
Greet all patients, family, or other related individuals while maintaining excellent customer service at all times.
Provide translation assistance as needed to facilitate the patient and provider interaction.
Report problems with workflow, conflicts, further skill training, and/or other related concerns to supervisory staff.
Work in conjunction with the healthcare team, participating in site improvement efforts, accepting coverage assignments.
Realize integral role as part of a healthcare team and be an active participant regarding flow, patient care, process issues/suggestions, barriers to care, and safety concerns.
Discharge functions in accordance with LFHC discharge policies.
Telephone functions in accordance with LFHC telephone policies.
Electronic Health Record (eHR) competencies in accordance with LFHC eHR policies.
Monitor and address Recall bins as per Failed Appointment policy.
Financial functions in accordance with LFHC Financial policies.
Registration functions in accordance with LFHC Registration policies.
